dev-1.x.name: drupal/commerce_user_profile_pane

security-coverage.message: Project has not opted into security advisory coverage!

dev-1.x.description: Provide a pane that allow to capture some user account profile fields at checkout process, this fields will be stored in the user entity instead of the commerce customer profiles. The fields that should be displayed in this pane are configurable through the user fields configuration form.
